sentences.en: A selection committee usually visits a candidate's home to look at general safety, neatness, the level of child-proofing, and to see whether people smoke inside, and who might be coming and going.
sentences.cn: 一个选举产生的委员会通常要去访问申请人的家庭，去查看一般的安全性，整洁性，对于儿童安全的等级，去看是否有人在里面抽烟，谁经常来访。

sentences.en: Answers will be marked for neatness as well as for accuracy.
He has great neatness of person.
He knew full well he had been outflanked, and he appreciated the neatness of it.
sentences.cn: 他十分清楚自己已经输了，他很欣赏这种干净利落的落败方式。

sentences.en: Her written work is a model of care and neatness.
sentences.cn: 她做的书面作业是认真清晰的典范.

sentences.en: His mother has been preaching at him again about his lack of neatness.
sentences.cn: 他母亲又唠叨他不整洁.

sentences.en: Laziness or a lack of neatness may manifest.
sentences.cn: 懒惰和笨拙可能会比较明显.

sentences.en: Maintaining workshop neatness and in good order.
sentences.cn: 维护生产区域的整洁有序.

sentences.en: My sister has been preaching at me again about my lack of neatness.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐又在跟我唠叨要我改掉不爱整洁的毛病.

sentences.en: Neat people place neatness above everything even economics. They are incredibly wasteful.
sentences.cn: 爱整洁的人视整洁高于一切,甚至金钱. 他们非常浪费.

sentences.en: Neatness and order are the order of the day.
sentences.cn: 干净整洁是当日规定应有之义.

sentences.en: The feeling of tranquility, neatness and simplicity revives vividly.
sentences.cn: 宁静 、 素洁、朴实的感觉,真真切切地复活.

sentences.en: The grounds were a perfect balance between neatness and natural wildness.
sentences.cn: 这些庭园是整齐有序和天然粗放的完美结合。

sentences.en: The pupil's written work is a model of neatness.
sentences.cn: 这个学生的笔头作业是整洁的模范.

sentences.en: The term "organization" often connotes a sense of neatness.
sentences.cn: organization这个词常常让人想到整洁。

sentences.en: This fits in with the larger Japanese attitude of neatness and order.
sentences.cn: 这和日本人更广泛的整洁观和秩序观倒是很搭配。

sentences.en: Your room is a marvel of neatness and order.

words.tran_cn: 灵巧的；整洁的；优雅的；齐整的；未搀水的；平滑的
